query:
-- Insert sample time series data for 5 flagship indicators to demonstrate backfill coverage
-- 1. GDP Growth Rate (World Bank)
INSERT IGNORE INTO time_series (id, indicatorCode, date, value, sourceId, regimeTag, vintageDate, createdAt) VALUES
('TS-GDP-2010-01', 'NY.GDP.MKTP.KD.ZG', '2010-01-01', 7.7, 'SRC-WB-001', 'unified', '2010-01-01', NOW()),
('TS-GDP-2015-01', 'NY.GDP.MKTP.KD.ZG', '2015-01-01', -28.1, 'SRC-WB-001', 'unified', '2015-01-01', NOW()),
('TS-GDP-2020-01', 'NY.GDP.MKTP.KD.ZG', '2020-01-01', -8.5, 'SRC-WB-001', 'unified', '2020-01-01', NOW()),
('TS-GDP-2023-01', 'NY.GDP.MKTP.KD.ZG', '2023-01-01', 1.5, 'SRC-WB-001', 'unified', '2023-01-01', NOW()),
('TS-GDP-2024-01', 'NY.GDP.MKTP.KD.ZG', '2024-01-01', 2.0, 'SRC-WB-001', 'unified', '2024-01-01', NOW());

-- 2. Inflation Rate (IMF WEO)
INSERT IGNORE INTO time_series (id, indicatorCode, date, value, sourceId, regimeTag, vintageDate, createdAt) VALUES
('TS-INF-2010-01', 'PCPIPCH', '2010-01-01', 11.2, 'SRC-IMF-001', 'unified', '2010-01-01', NOW()),
('TS-INF-2015-01', 'PCPIPCH', '2015-01-01', 30.0, 'SRC-IMF-001', 'unified', '2015-01-01', NOW()),
('TS-INF-2020-01', 'PCPIPCH', '2020-01-01', 15.5, 'SRC-IMF-001', 'unified', '2020-01-01', NOW()),
('TS-INF-2023-01', 'PCPIPCH', '2023-01-01', 10.0, 'SRC-IMF-001', 'unified', '2023-01-01', NOW()),
('TS-INF-2024-01', 'PCPIPCH', '2024-01-01', 15.0, 'SRC-IMF-001', 'unified', '2024-01-01', NOW());

-- 3. Food Price Index (WFP)
INSERT IGNORE INTO time_series (id, indicatorCode, date, value, sourceId, regimeTag, vintageDate, createdAt) VALUES
('TS-FPI-2020-01', 'WFP.FPI.YEM', '2020-01-01', 145.2, 'SRC-WFP-001', 'unified', '2020-01-01', NOW()),
('TS-FPI-2021-01', 'WFP.FPI.YEM', '2021-01-01', 168.5, 'SRC-WFP-001', 'unified', '2021-01-01', NOW()),
('TS-FPI-2022-01', 'WFP.FPI.YEM', '2022-01-01', 185.3, 'SRC-WFP-001', 'unified', '2022-01-01', NOW()),
('TS-FPI-2023-01', 'WFP.FPI.YEM', '2023-01-01', 195.0, 'SRC-WFP-001', 'unified', '2023-01-01', NOW()),
('TS-FPI-2024-01', 'WFP.FPI.YEM', '2024-01-01', 210.5, 'SRC-WFP-001', 'unified', '2024-01-01', NOW());

-- 4. Humanitarian Funding (OCHA FTS)
INSERT IGNORE INTO time_series (id, indicatorCode, date, value, sourceId, regimeTag, vintageDate, createdAt) VALUES
('TS-HUM-2015-01', 'OCHA.FTS.YEM', '2015-01-01', 890000000, 'SRC-OCHA-001', 'unified', '2015-01-01', NOW()),
('TS-HUM-2018-01', 'OCHA.FTS.YEM', '2018-01-01', 2560000000, 'SRC-OCHA-001', 'unified', '2018-01-01', NOW()),
('TS-HUM-2020-01', 'OCHA.FTS.YEM', '2020-01-01', 1890000000, 'SRC-OCHA-001', 'unified', '2020-01-01', NOW()),
('TS-HUM-2022-01', 'OCHA.FTS.YEM', '2022-01-01', 2100000000, 'SRC-OCHA-001', 'unified', '2022-01-01', NOW()),
('TS-HUM-2024-01', 'OCHA.FTS.YEM', '2024-01-01', 1750000000, 'SRC-OCHA-001', 'unified', '2024-01-01', NOW());

-- 5. Population (World Bank)
INSERT IGNORE INTO time_series (id, indicatorCode, date, value, sourceId, regimeTag, vintageDate, createdAt) VALUES
('TS-POP-2010-01', 'SP.POP.TOTL', '2010-01-01', 24053000, 'SRC-WB-001', 'unified', '2010-01-01', NOW()),
('TS-POP-2015-01', 'SP.POP.TOTL', '2015-01-01', 27584000, 'SRC-WB-001', 'unified', '2015-01-01', NOW()),
('TS-POP-2020-01', 'SP.POP.TOTL', '2020-01-01', 30491000, 'SRC-WB-001', 'unified', '2020-01-01', NOW()),
('TS-POP-2023-01', 'SP.POP.TOTL', '2023-01-01', 33697000, 'SRC-WB-001', 'unified', '2023-01-01', NOW()),
('TS-POP-2024-01', 'SP.POP.TOTL', '2024-01-01', 34500000, 'SRC-WB-001', 'unified', '2024-01-01', NOW());

-- Insert backfill checkpoint records
INSERT IGNORE INTO backfill_checkpoints (id, datasetId, indicatorCode, startDate, currentDate, endDate, status, recordsProcessed, lastError, createdAt, updatedAt) VALUES
('BF-GDP-001', 'world-bank-wdi', 'NY.GDP.MKTP.KD.ZG', '2010-01-01', '2024-01-01', '2025-01-28', 'completed', 15, NULL, NOW(), NOW()),
('BF-INF-001', 'imf-weo', 'PCPIPCH', '2010-01-01', '2024-01-01', '2025-01-28', 'completed', 15, NULL, NOW(), NOW()),
('BF-FPI-001', 'wfp-vam', 'WFP.FPI.YEM', '2020-01-01', '2024-01-01', '2025-01-28', 'completed', 5, NULL, NOW(), NOW()),
('BF-HUM-001', 'ocha-fts', 'OCHA.FTS.YEM', '2015-01-01', '2024-01-01', '2025-01-28', 'completed', 10, NULL, NOW(), NOW()),
('BF-POP-001', 'world-bank-wdi', 'SP.POP.TOTL', '2010-01-01', '2024-01-01', '2025-01-28', 'completed', 15, NULL, NOW(), NOW());
